title: Game of Thrones: Hedge Knight 1+2 (2003-08|Dgtl-GN-HR) (re-edit)
description:
Overview:


  <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tales_of_Dunk_and_Egg#Adaptations" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tales_of_Dunk_and_Egg#Adaptations</a>




Contains:


   The Hedge Knight (2003, 2013) (Digital-GN-1800)

   The Sworn Sword  (2007, 2014) (Digital-GN-1800) (Empire)


      The original releases seemed a bit... rough-hewn, to me: Pages that should
      have been joined weren't, pages that were joined weren't properly cropped,
      the back-matter sections were somewhat jumbled, and so on. I straightened
      all that out as best I could, threw out some duplicate or near-duplicate
      pages serving as nothing more than filler, and consolidated the covers
      into galleries (same as in all my compilations). All in all, these
      versions should give you a significantly smoother read. :)
